channel.title: Installation on 小白菜
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on 小白菜

item.title: Install From Scratch
item.description: We offers an example site for getting started with this theme. Please run these commands from PowerShell or a Linux terminal such as WSL or Git Bash. Requirements Go Hugo extended version Node.js 16 or later Read more on prerequisites. Clone the Repository 1git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/hbstack/theme-cards Copy the Example Site 1cp -r theme-cards/exampleSite mysite Change Working Directory 1cd mysite Tweak go.mod This guide uses sed command to edit the file, please feel free to open and edit the go.
